alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued March 31 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Warning at the request of Oklahoma Forestry Services for Lincoln County. * AT 334 PM CDT, a dangerous wildfire was located 3 miles northwest of Chandler, moving rapidly east at 3 to 5 mph. * Areas impacted... areas north of Chandler and the Turner Turnpike northeast of Chandler. * Additional Information... fire and reduced visibility due to smoke will present a threat to life and property. $$ TL
info.instruction: Be prepared to evacuate quickly if requested and follow all safety instructions from local emergency management officials. Do not drive into smoke. Firefighters and incident responders should anticipate extreme fire behavior including a wind-driven and torching fire.
